analysis: The current project has a basic structure with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files. The theme is not fully developed for the black hole topic, and there are no animations or interactive elements related to black holes. The CSS file needs to be updated with a cosmic theme, including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML file needs to be completed to include sections related to black holes, and the JavaScript file needs to be updated to add functionality for interactive elements and animations.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with the full intended dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes.

Update the JavaScript file to add event listeners and functionality for the new buttons added in test-website/index.html, and ensure all functions are properly implemented with smooth transitions and user-friendly interactions.
